panels.visual: Visual: The glowing figure (Lightsword) kneels down to be at eye level with Spore, the small myconid. The mushroom creature looks up with big, sad eyes. Location: Cave bedroom doorway Characters: Lightsword, Spore
panels.dialogue: Lightsword: "I have to go to the Temple today, Spore."

characters.Lightsword: A GLOWING ETHEREAL FIGURE made entirely of soft golden-white light. NOT a lizard, NOT humanoid with defined features - pure luminous energy in vaguely humanoid shape. No visible face, just two bright points of warm light where eyes would be. The entire body GLOWS and PULSES with inner light. Wearing simple cream-colored ceremonial robes that the light shines through. Ethereal, mysterious, magical being of pure radiance.
characters.Spore: A small MUSHROOM CREATURE (myconid) about knee-height to a humanoid. Pale cream-colored cap with BIOLUMINESCENT SPOTS that glow soft blue. Big, expressive dark eyes like pools of night. Small stubby arms and legs, spongy and soft looking body. Releases colored spores based on emotion - currently releasing GRAY SPORES showing sadness. Lightsword's best friend.
characters.LightswordGlowing: A glowing, indeterminate humanoid figure wrapped in soft golden-white light. No defined species yet - ethereal and mysterious. Wearing simple ceremonial robes over the glowing form. Eyes are bright points of warm light. The light pulses gently with emotions.

panels.visual: Visual: Spore releases soft gray spores - sadness. His small hands reach up toward Lightsword. Characters: Spore

characters.Spore: A small MUSHROOM CREATURE (myconid) about knee-height to a humanoid. Pale cream-colored cap with BIOLUMINESCENT SPOTS that glow soft blue. Releasing GRAY SPORES that float upward, expressing sadness and worry.
